pr_title: fix: update packer_cache to increase the resilience against network i…

timeline.message: fix: update packer_cache to increase the resilience against network issues

timeline.author: kuisathaverat
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,8 +1,13 @@
 #!/usr/bin/env bash
 source /usr/local/bin/bash_standard_lib.sh
 
-JAVA_HOME=$HOME/.java/java10 ./mvnw clean verify \
+JAVA_HOME=$HOME/.java/java11 ./mvnw clean verify \
   --fail-never -q -B \
+  -Dmaven.javadoc.skip=true \
+  -Dhttps.protocols=TLSv1.2 \
+  -Dmaven.wagon.http.retryHandler.count=3 \
+  -Dhttp.keepAlive=false \
+  -Dmaven.wagon.http.pool=false \
